title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Control Policy Design Simulation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of control systems fundamentals, linear algebra, and probabilistic optimization concepts
context.additional_context: Learning Control Theory Applications in Social Engineering for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Implement a homotopy-based policy initialization strategy in continuous-time systems within a simulation environment
Explain step-by-step the stability proof procedure for model-based/model-free control designs
Apply algorithms that shift unstable system poles to stable regions using real-world datasets

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
